summary: DisplayPort is a digital connection for computers and monitors. It was made to replace older connections like VGA and DVI. This interface sends video and audio through small data packets, allowing for better resolution and more features. It can also carry USB data. DisplayPort is adaptable; it can work with DVI and HDMI using adapters. The design uses fewer pins and improves image quality, making it a popular choice for modern devices.
title: DisplayPort
